metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17420 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In OISF LibHTP before 0.5.31, as used in Suricata 4.1.4 and other products, an HTTP protocol parsing error causes the http_header signature to not alert on a response with a single \r\n ending.

criterions.comment: libhtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
